scenes.description: 画面淡入,展现云雾缭绕的仙域上空,金色卷轴在空中展开,光芒闪动,背景音乐渐起。

visual.composition: Misty immortal skies with a golden scroll unfurling
visual.environment: Immortal realm sky veiled in clouds and golden light
visual.fx: Golden radiance and scroll unfurl effect

scenes.prompt: Xianxia opening, mist-wreathed immortal sky with a golden scroll unfurling, spiritual particles drifting, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 我是云卷仙音,欢迎回来。第6集:如云客栈·金刚试锋。

scenes.description: 韩立推门入书铺,目光一扫挤满卷轴与木架。

visual.composition: Han Li pushes open the bookshop door and sweeps his gaze over shelves crammed with scrolls
visual.character_pose: Han Li stepping through the doorway

scenes.prompt: Han Li steps into the cramped bookshop, eyes roaming across rows of scroll-laden shelves.
scenes.narration: 他潜入偏僻书铺，盯上介绍灵界的典籍，准备了解这个新世界。

scenes.description: 韩立抱出厚书与地图,以一块灵石付款,老板欣喜若狂。

visual.composition: Han Li cradles thick tomes and a map, handing over a spirit stone while the shopkeeper beams
visual.character_pose: Han Li presenting the books and map

scenes.prompt: Han Li carries out heavy books and a map, pays with a single spirit stone, and the shopkeeper lights up with joy.
scenes.narration: 灵石出手，书店掌柜连声道谢，奉上地图，交易顺利完成。

scenes.description: 他在酒楼角落摊开书卷,边吃粗菜边飞快翻阅。

visual.composition: He spreads out the scrolls in a tavern corner, flipping pages quickly while eating simple dishes

scenes.prompt: In a tavern corner he opens the scrolls, skimming them rapidly between bites of coarse food.
scenes.narration: 酒楼角落里，他一边夹菜一边翻厚卷，仔细研读典籍内容。

scenes.description: 书页浮现三皇与七妖领地图,韩立神色震动。

visual.composition: The page conjures a map of the Three Sovereigns and Seven Demon Territories while Han Li looks shaken
visual.fx: Glowing map emerging from the pages

scenes.prompt: A glowing map of the Three Sovereigns and Seven Demon Domains rises from the page, startling Han Li.
scenes.narration: 他才知天元境只是三皇之一,七妖地同样环伺。

scenes.description: 关于仙阵阵眼的段落在眼前滚动,韩立在心中推演。

visual.composition: Paragraphs about immortal array cores scroll past as Han Li rehearses deductions in his mind

scenes.prompt: Lines describing the immortal array nodes glide before him while he silently deduces their workings.
scenes.narration: 真仙阵笼罩三境七地,他暗想自己落点何以精准。

scenes.description: 讲述兽潮的插图铺满桌面,狼影与蛇群叠映。

visual.composition: Illustrations of the beast tides cover the table, wolf shadows overlapping with coiling serpents

scenes.prompt: Diagrams of the beast tides spread across the tabletop, wolf silhouettes layered over masses of snakes.
scenes.narration: 书中详解狼潮蛇潮,他推断安远城危险不小。

scenes.description: 韩立放下酒杯,想到三百年一遇的小天劫,眉头深锁。

visual.composition: Han Li sets down his wine cup, brows knotted at the thought of the once-in-three-centuries minor tribulation

scenes.prompt: Han Li lowers his cup, frowning deeply as he recalls the minor heavenly tribulation that comes once every three centuries.
scenes.narration: 想到化神天劫可能提前降临,他愈发心急。

scenes.description: 他在脑海中勾勒金刚诀七层,最终锁定以肉身破禁之策。

visual.composition: Within his mind he sketches the seven layers of the Vajra Art, settling on smashing the seal with sheer flesh

scenes.prompt: He envisions the seven tiers of the Vajra Art and decides the only path is to break the seal with his body.
scenes.narration: 他决定把金刚诀苦修至大成,再谈恢复法力。

scenes.description: 在巷口他双掌一合,把厚厚书籍碾成漫天纸屑。

visual.composition: At the alley mouth he claps his palms and grinds the thick volumes into a storm of paper scraps

scenes.prompt: At the alley entrance he brings both palms together, crushing the heavy books into a cloud of paper shreds.
scenes.narration: 典籍使命已完，他直接拍碎以免留痕，确保不露踪迹。

scenes.description: 铁匠铺内红火闪耀,韩立递出地蛟筋,指点加工。

visual.composition: Inside the forge, red fire blooms as Han Li hands over the earth flood-dragon tendon and explains the build

scenes.prompt: Within the glowing smithy, Han Li passes the earth flood-dragon sinew to the smiths and outlines the refinement.
scenes.narration: 他托匠人按图打造随身绞索,灵石先行付清。

scenes.description: 韩立拦下私人兽车,银锭抛出,车夫犹豫后应允。

visual.composition: Han Li flags down a private beast cart, tosses a silver ingot, and the driver relents

scenes.prompt: Han Li intercepts a private beast cart, flips a silver ingot, and the hesitant driver finally agrees.
scenes.narration: 他用银锭租下私家兽车,直奔如云客栈。

scenes.description: 抵达客栈门前,韩立甩给小厮碎银,让其指路。

visual.composition: Arriving at the inn gate, Han Li flicks silver shards to the servant boy to lead the way

scenes.prompt: At the inn entrance, Han Li tosses a bit of silver to the runner and has him guide the route.
scenes.narration: 小厮得了赏钱,主动领他去西院找商号同伴。

scenes.description: 罗姓骑士迎面而来,热情拉他去见方夫人。

visual.composition: The Luo clansman rider strides up warmly and pulls him along to meet Madam Fang

scenes.prompt: A Luo-named rider greets him with enthusiasm and drags him toward Madam Fang's quarters.
scenes.narration: 小七笑嘻嘻地现身,说夫人正等他过去。

scenes.description: 院门前两名魁梧侍卫冷眼打量,气势逼人。

visual.composition: Two burly guards stand before the courtyard gate, sizing him up with icy stares

scenes.prompt: Two hulking guards at the courtyard gate glare coldly, their presence oppressive.
scenes.narration: 守门大汉目光如刀,先冷嘲他年纪太轻。

scenes.description: 对方伸手试力,韩立随意一甩便把大汉抛飞。

visual.composition: When the guard reaches out to test him, Han Li casually flicks his arm and throws the big man
visual.character_pose: Han Li flinging the guard aside

scenes.prompt: The guard grabs for a test, but Han Li gives a light swing and sends the burly man flying.
scenes.narration: 巨力喷发,试探的侍卫被他轻描淡写地甩了出去。

scenes.description: 第二名侍卫接住同伴也被震退,最终抱拳让路。

visual.composition: The second guard catches his comrade yet is forced back, then clasps his fists and steps aside

scenes.prompt: Another guard catches the flying man, staggers from the force, and finally bows aside to open the path.
scenes.narration: 两人这才恭敬让道,承认他货真价实。

scenes.description: 屋内方夫人端坐主位,潘青与金玉宗三名筑基在侧。

visual.composition: Inside, Madam Fang sits at the head seat with Pan Qing and three Jin Yuzong foundation disciples beside her

scenes.prompt: Madam Fang sits at the main seat with Pan Qing and three Jin Yuzong cultivators arrayed at her sides.
scenes.narration: 方夫人与潘青及三位金玉宗弟子早已等候。

scenes.description: 锦袍修士寒暄后,暗中探问他是否天生神力,韩立淡淡应对。

visual.composition: After pleasantries the brocaded cultivator discreetly asks if he was born with divine strength while Han Li answers placidly

scenes.prompt: The robed cultivator makes small talk then quietly probes whether Han Li is innately powerful; Han Li replies casually.
scenes.narration: 锦袍修士探口风,他只笑言天生力大,不露来历。

scenes.description: 方夫人宣布让韩立担任护卫副首,协助张奎迎战兽潮。

visual.composition: Madam Fang declares Han Li the deputy chief guard to aid Zhang Kui against the beast tide

scenes.prompt: Madam Fang names Han Li the deputy guard commander to stand with Zhang Kui against the beast tide.
scenes.narration: 她当场任命他为护卫副首,叮嘱蓄力以待大兽潮。

scenes.description: 韩立离去后,屋内众人低声密议,要借他金刚之体争夺某物,他却全然不知。

visual.composition: After Han Li leaves, the group inside leans together whispering

scenes.prompt: Once Han Li departs, the room gathers in hushed discussion about using his Vajra body to seize a prize unbeknownst to him.
scenes.narration: 他前脚离开,方夫人与金玉宗却谋划借他护送夺宝。

scenes.description: 画面淡出,夜色下的仙城剪影,天空洒落灵光,画面逐渐变暗。

visual.composition: Silhouette of the immortal city beneath night as spiritual light falls from the sky
visual.environment: Night sky, immortal city outline, drifting light motes

scenes.prompt: Xianxia ending, immortal city silhouette under the night sky, spiritual motes drifting down, calm mysterious mood, wide shot, cinematic lighting, 4K
scenes.narration: 下一集再见。我是云卷仙音,原著作者忘语。第7集即将开始。
